title: Michael Boulos

2020|access-date=2020-08-04|website=Callian Capital Group|language=en-CA}}</ref> In February 2020, it was reported that Boulos, along with his associates at Callian, submitted a proposal to provide title: Michael Boulos
deleted: '''Michael Boulos''' (born August 27, 1997) is an American business executive. He is the son of Massad Boulos, and, through his father, he is a billionaire heir to his family's two businesses: [[Boulos Enterprises]] and [[SCOA Nigeria]].

title: Michael Boulos
deleted: '''Michael Boulos''' (born August 27, 1997) is an American business executive.He is the associate director of the Canadian investment group Callian Capital Group.He is the son of Massad Boulos, and, through his father, he is a billionaire heir to his family's two businesses: [[Boulos Enterprises]] and [[SCOA Nigeria]].

title: Michael Boulos
